name: Broken Memory: Battle Mode
description:
These customisations can be made to both the player and enemy attributes:

  1. Rename characters (anything you want)
  2. Lives (1 to 10)
  3. Speed (Normal or Fast)
  4. Size (Medium or Large)
  5. Colour (Blue, Scarlet, Indigo, Violet, Jade or Amber)
  6. Ability (None, Glide, Double Jump, Wall Jump, Stomp or Dash)

Controls

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Space - Finish reading text
  • Z - Pick up and throw block 
  • R - Restart
  • P - Play from the beginning
  • M - Mute / Unmute all sounds

Main features (so far)

  • The ability to pick up and throw a block
  • Enemy AI
  • Dialogue
  • Special abilities
